CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS danmu_room_1( cid varchar(50) NOT NULL, type varchar(20), gid varchar(20), rid varchar(20), uid varchar(20), nn varchar(20), bnn varchar(10), txt varchar(100), level varchar(10), mtime Date )ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
